snippet: Washington’s Alex Ovechkin played only 13 minutes 26 seconds of Game 2 against the Rangers but still ended up the hero at Madison Square Garden.
abstract: Washington Capitals captain Alex Ovechkin plays only 13 minutes 26 seconds of Game 2 against New York Rangers but still ends up the hero in 3-2 victory.
lead_paragraph: Washington’s Alex Ovechkin played only 13 minutes 26 seconds of Game 2 against the Rangers but still ended up the hero at Madison Square Garden.

headline.seo: N.H.L. Playoffs — Alex Ovechkin Leads Capitals Despite Playing Little
